Minneapolis.West Calhoun, Minneapolis: West Calhoun is a neighborhood in Minneapolis, Minnesota. It is the southwesternmost neighborhood of the Calhoun Isles community, an affluent region in the western part of the city. West Calhoun is bordered on the east by East Calhoun, or "ECCO", the north by Cedar-Isles-Dean, the south by Linden Hills and the west by the city of St.
